name: A Mad Road Warrior Extreme Real Car Racing: 3D Race Simulator Game
name_original: A Mad Road Warrior Extreme Real Car Racing: 3D Race Simulator Game
description:
Sometime in the future the road will belong only to the fastest and deadliest cars & trucks as they try to rule the road! Your only hope of survival is total destruction to all vehicles in the way! Your Warrior vehicle is capable of blasting and crashing into the enemy.

But there are dust storms hiding your enemy, oil slicks splatter the road and gas is hard to come by. And time is running out, your enemies are on the road and on the run - you can't wait any longer because -

The Battle for the ROAD begins RIGHT NOW!

You are equipped with -
* MISSILES!! Lots of Missiles!
* Your pick of NITRO Charged Road Warrior Styled Cars or Trucks
* Selection of Camera Angles to better suit your driving style
* Immersive music and sound effects
* Achievements - LOTS of achievements
* 3D Graphics
* Leader Board for bragging rights

Don't give up the fight! You can rule the road once again...
